bug.short_desc: Corebird shows current tweets as being from '1 Mar' and other date mis-displays
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Starting at midnight May 1st (in my time zone, Eastern time), current tweets show as being from '1 Mar' and older tweets show as being from earlier, eg this tweet shows as being from '28 Feb':
https://twitter.com/BrentToderian/status/858908514374238208
(In the detailed view it is reported as being dated '02/28/17, 23:58:42'.)
Sufficiently old tweets appear to be dated correctly by corebird, eg https://twitter.com/MaxCRoser/status/858672877297651712 shows as '30 Apr' or '04/30/17, 09:22:21' in the detailed view.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): corebird-1.4.2-1.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Start corebird 2. Look at tweet dates 3. If necessary, visit tweets on the web to verify that the displayed date is incorrect.
Actual results: Tweets show as being from March, not May.
Expected results: Tweets show as being from May.
Additional info:
I believe that this is already fixed upstream in commit https://github.com/baedert/corebird/commit/55dbcd8
